Package org.glite.data.hydra.javacli.core

Class Summary
HydraAuth A class containing helper methods to do 2-way authentication to a SSL-server.
HydraConnection A class to work as an interface between the Hydra-webservice SOAP-interface and our Java-client.
HydraCrypt A class to handle the encryption operations.
HydraExceptions  
HydraFileHandler A helper class to handle file-operations in our tool Most action is performed with SecretKeys, since stored keys do not necessarily need the extra-metadata information of HydraKey.
HydraKey The class to extend SecretKeySpec to contain and handle the subclass of HydraKeys.
HydraSettings Class to keep track of the settings of given Hydra Setup and interact with HydraServers as single entity.
HydraUtils Misc.
